str2: And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
To put to death, kill; fig: I abolish. From apo and kteino; to kill outright; figuratively, to destroy.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A commander of a thousand men, a military tribune. From chilioi and archo; the commander of a thousand soldiers
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A cohort, the tenth part of a legion; a military guard.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go up, mount, ascend; of things: I rise, spring up, come up. From ana and the base of basis; to go up.
Report, tidings, information. From phemi; a saying, i.e. Report.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
All, the whole, entire, complete. A primary word; 'whole' or 'all', i.e. Complete, especially as noun or adverb.
Of Hebrew origin; Hierusalem, the capitol of Palestine.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Or sugchuno from sun and cheo or its alternate; to commingle promiscuously, i.e. to throw into disorder, to perplex.
